name: Life sized chair
description: A fully functional chair (stool) that can support a person's weight. Folded from a 120cm square of 2-ply cardboard. Designed for a challenge as part of the top comment series.
cpdescription: The first image is the crease pattern--the second image is how to combine multiple sheets of cardboard into a larger square. The direction of the grain is important for the strength of the chair.
